channel.title: I got a Xbox 360, any recommended games?
channel.description:
I got a 360 pro(60 Gb), and Halo 3. I already have the following on my list of games to get: Aliens vs. Predator 3 Halo: Combat Evolved Halo 2 Halo 3: ODST (hell yes!) Halo Wars Fable: The Lost Chapters Fable 2 Fallout 3 game of the year edition Left 4 Dead game of the year edition The Orange Box Worms 4 Mayhem MX Unleashed Mass Effect Mass Effect 2 Lego Star Wars full collection COD 4 COD 5 Red Faction: Guerilla Unreal Tournament 3 GoW1 GoW2 Dead Space Bioshock 1 Bioshock 2 Psychonauts Prototype Quake 4 Dead Rising Mirror's Edge
Can you recommend anything else? Preferably a FPS or RPG? Edit: Oh shit! Now Elites are selling for $300! If only I had waited...

item.title: I got a Xbox 360, any recommended games?
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
What sucked about it was that everything looks EXACTLY THE SAME, your new allies suck something awful, and there is a horde of dudes with rocket launchers right around every corner.

item.source: I got a Xbox 360, any recommended games?

item.title: I got a Xbox 360, any recommended games?
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
mr.FREEMANZ!!!!!!!!:

Actually, I just finsished the single player campaign in Halo 3. Best game ever.

Eh, it was good when I first got my 360, but now I just don’t know what I saw in it.
Luckily, multiplayer makes it all worth it! My friend is amazing at Forge, and theater mode is great for machinima!

mr.FREEMANZ!!!!!!!!:
Jonson died though. :frowning:

Yes, but his spirit lives on… if you pre-ordered Halo 3: ODST like I did!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cBPnUFn4s_4&eurl=http%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Eyoutube%2Ecom%2Fuser%2FBungie&feature=player_profilepage

Master Chef:

^This

except for the library level

God, I can understand why so many people don’t like Halo if THAT was the only level they played.
Cortana in Halo 3 is also a bitch (and I mean that in both ways, lol.)

Read full topic
item.source: I got a Xbox 360, any recommended games?

item.title: I got a Xbox 360, any recommended games?
item.dc:creator: bob
item.description:
Here are some games you might want to play on Xbox 360 for anyone interested:
Wolfenstein
Halo 3: ODST (it’s coming out soon so it counts)
Serious Sam HD (download it off XBOX LIVE, it’s Serious Sam 1 with up-to-date graphics)
Quake 4
Dead Space
Quantum of Solace 007
Tomb Raider: Underworld
Mass Effect
Black Site Area 51
Perfect Dark Zero
Tomb Raider: Anniversary (a remake of the original 1996 Tomb Raider 1)
Tomb Raider: Legend

item.title: I got a Xbox 360, any recommended games?
item.dc:creator: loony636
item.description:
Master Chef:

Hello, Welcome to Black Mesa Forums. You must be new here. I’m Master Chef. Everyone here agrees that I am the supreme ruler of the forums. You obviously must be lost. Raminator’s Ladies Club is a few threads above here. Have a nice day!

Oh burn. Gosh, I’ll be feeling that one for weeks.

Funnily enough, this thread’s proximity to Raminator’s Ladies Club is probably the closest you’ll get to any particularly large group of women. And since this is the internet, most of them will be men.

I’d second the recommendation for Dead Rising. Its just fun.

Spooks:

See, the thing here is that more than half of the titles you mentioned can be purchased on PC, which is a superior gaming platform in a technical aspect and if I hear someone deny that I’m gonna have to choke a bitch, or even the Playstation 3 and the rest are stuff you can get are pretty fun games but ones you can easily live without. It’s funny that it’s all “Xbawks has them moar gaems” when all the exclusives you can get is Halos and Gears. Besides that, Crackdown and Dead Rising are fun, and Ninja Gaiden is motherfucking hard, but the best exclusive you can hope for right now is Alan Wake.

Here here.

Not to mention the fact that FPS’s on PC are infinitely better than on consoles.

Read full topic

item.source: I got a Xbox 360, any recommended games?

item.title: I got a Xbox 360, any recommended games?
item.dc:creator: Spooks
item.description:
• Shadow Complex
  • Castle Crashers

There you go. Those are the only really good games. And they’re XBLA. And the only reason I’m mentioning them is because they’re exclusive. See, the thing here is that more than half of the titles you mentioned can be purchased on PC, which is a superior gaming platform in a technical aspect and if I hear someone deny that I’m gonna have to choke a bitch, or even the Playstation 3 and the rest are stuff you can get are pretty fun games but ones you can easily live without. It’s funny that it’s all “Xbawks has them moar gaems” when all the exclusives you can get is Halos and Gears. Besides that, Crackdown and Dead Rising are fun, and Ninja Gaiden is motherfucking hard, but the best exclusive you can hope for right now is Alan Wake.

If I was you I’d purchase a PS3 right now. You got your Killzones and Resistances to replace Halos and Gears in the EXTREMELY IMAGINATIVE SHOOTERS OF FIRST PERSON PERSPECTIVE WHERE YOU ARE A SPACE MARINE KILLING ALIENS category should you really have such urge to play that type of game. You also get your upcoming Uncharted Twos and Heavy Rains. There’s them Fat Princesses and Flowers on PSN and LBP if that’s your cup of tea and you can watch Kojima’s 8 hour long movie about metal gears if you fancy that stuff.

All in all, the point I’m trying to pass through here is that the point of buying a console is to play awesome exclusives like Brutal Legend, Alan Wake and Heavy Rain, for everything else multiplatform there is gaming PCs, and if you’re telling me your PC cannot at least run Bioshock/Assassin’s Creed/CoD4/Dead Space on medium… Do yourself a fucking favor for Pete’s sake. Invest those money somewhere you’ll be rewarded in the long term.

Master Chef:

Hello, Welcome to Black Mesa Forums. You must be new here. I’m Master Chef. Everyone here agrees that I am the supreme ruler of the forums. You obviously must be lost. Raminator’s Ladies Club is a few threads above here. Have a nice day!

HAHAHAHAHAHAHA[/SIZE]

Get the fuck out of here, son.

Read full topic

I’m making a signature on Frank West soon, Greatest game character I’ve played in years.

item.title: I got a Xbox 360, any recommended games?
item.dc:creator: The_Gman
item.description:
If it isn’t on this list I don’t like it or it’s a waste of money (meaning it sucks or its sequel is coming and will be better)

Modern Warfare 1&2
Assassins Creed 2
Bad Company 2 (Frostbite engine is amazing)
Left 4 Dead 2
Halo ODST (I heard it’s free roam)
Fallout 3
Dead Space
Bioshock 1&2
Halo Wars
AVP3 [Haven’t heard of it yet, sounds good]
KOTR II

*Orange Box is better for PC
*Prototype has less than 10 hours of gameplay [FAIL]

Read full topic
